game

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    Class generation the tiles of the board.
    Author:
    Richard, Julien

      • Tile

        Constructor for Tile.

    • Method Detail

      • change

        public void change(boolean base,
                   int size,
                   Color e)
        Places a ring or a base in the current tile.
        Parameters:
        base - Boolean that specifies whether or not the change should take up the whole tile
        size - Size of the ring to be placed, if base = false
        e - Color of the piece to be added

      • isTileEmpty

        public boolean isTileEmpty()
        Checks whether or not this tile is completely empty.
        Returns:
        true if this Tile is completely empty

      • isSpotEmpty

        public boolean isSpotEmpty(int size)
        Checks whether or not the specified position in this Tile is empty.

        Other positions do not matter for this function.

        Parameters:
        size - Position to check in
        Returns:
        true if the spot is empty

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Color.ColGroup e)
        Checks whether or not a this Tile contains any piece of the ColGroup specified, or the starting base.
        Parameters:
        e - The specified ColGroup
        Returns:
        true if this Tile contains any piece of the ColGroup specified, or the starting base (as it is a universal color)

      • hasBase

        public boolean hasBase(Color c)
        Checks whether or not this Tile contains a base of the given Color.
        Parameters:
        c - Color to check for
        Returns:
        true if this Tile contains a base of the given Color

      • getColor

        public Color getColor(int size)
        Getter for color.
        Parameters:
        size - Position of the color to return. Corresponds to ring size
        Returns:
        Color stored in the specified position in this Tile

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
